text: waqul - ya jbryl - lmhmd: wama natanazal - nahn almalayikat - min alsama' 'iilaa al'ard 'iilaa bi'amr rabik lna, lah ma bayn 'aydina mimaa yastaqbil min 'amr alakhrt, wama khalfana mimaa madaa min aldnya, wama bayn aldunya walakhrt, falah al'amr kuluh fi alzman walmkan, wama kan rabuk nasyana lishay' min alashya'
